name: Spacewalker (itch) (Underpaid_Goblin)
description:
In Spacewalker, you play as an astronaut performing one of the most dangerous jobs in space, a spacewalk. Make repairs on various satellites throughout Earth's orbit and refuel back at the station.  Armed with a small pack of fuel and a lot of determination, set out into the void of space and get the job done!

Controls:

(When in space) 

W - Propulsion

A/D - Turn

(When in the station)

W - Jump

A/D - Move Left/Right

Credits:

Art and game by Underpaid_Goblin

Sound effects and music from ZapSplat.com

Made in 3 days for the Mini Jam 77: Courage

 Limitation: Cannot take place on earth

Updated the music to lower the volume, original version still downloadable.
